shots.description: Fast paced promo piece, shot music video style.  There is a good amount of fast movement, as well as low-mode, both of which are difficult elements.
shots.operatorComments:
This aired during the Results show of American Idol 2006.
6 contestants remain.
85-90% Steadicam. 
Shot at the Paramount Pictures back lot.
Tethered to a video cable except for the low mode shot of the tables being knocked over. It was just too critical of a shot..

shots.description: Another promo, shot music video style.  Much of the video is shot in low-mode, which seems to echo the laid back and "low" Los Angeles, hip-hop feeling.
shots.operatorComments:
This aired during the Results show of American Idol 2006. 3 contestants remain: Tylor Hicks, Katherine McPhee and Elliot Yamin 85-90% Steadicam. 

This was shot at the Sea Port Marina and Hotel in Long Beach. Lots and lots of low-mode. Tethered to a video cable.  I flew the rig and camera up-side-down. They flipped the image in post. Transition time to go into low mode or high mode was around 15 seconds or so.
